snippet.title: Terraria: Split Mod Trailer
snippet.description:
Were you waiting? This update took long enough to make, and finally we're ready to release it! Refresh your Terraria experience by fighting new bosses, trading with NPCs and forging new items! Available now! Be sure to update it in mod browser, or get the mod here: http://javid.ddns.net/tModLoader/download.php?Down=mods/Split.tmod

Join our Discord server to learn more about the update: https://discord.gg/Ee9Pj49
